pages.text: $(li)Carrot on a Stick can be used to ride $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/pig)Pigs$(/l).$(br)$(li)First you have to equip a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/cat)Saddle$(/l) to it.$(br)$(li)Then, right click to the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/pig)Pig$(/l) to ride it.
$(li)Now, just hold the Carrot on a Stick on your hand to make it walk in any direction.
